attributes.name: load
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: Load the provided component

tags.name: au-viewport
tags.description: The <au-viewport> element is where all of the routing magic happens, the outlet.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The name of the viewport

attributes.name: default
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The default component to load in the viewport

attributes.name: fallback
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The fallback component to load in the viewport, if the user requests a non-existing component

attributes.name: used-by
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: Restrict which components are allowed to render in the viewport

references.name: Aurelia Documentation: Specifying Which Components A Viewport Can Render

attributes.name: no-link
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The viewport content isn't added to the browser's location url

attributes.name: no-title
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The viewport content title isn't added to the browser's title

attributes.name: no-history
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: Navigation isn't added to browser history.

attributes.name: no-scope
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The viewport doesn't define its own viewport scope, children become part of parent scope.

tags.name: au-nav
tags.description: Aurelia Router: Generated navigation menu, based upon routes

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Aurelia Router: The name of the navigation menu

tags.name: au-slot
tags.description: Aurelia Template: au-slot for content projection, simular to slot, but without using Shadow DOM

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Aurelia Template: The name of the slot

references.name: Aurelia Documentation: Shadow DOM and Slots

tags.name: bindable
tags.description: Aurelia Template: define a bindable property, used for HTML-only components

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Aurelia Template: The name of the bindable property

references.name: Aurelia Documentation: Shadow DOM and Slots

globalAttributes.name: au-slot
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: au-slot for content projection, simular to slot, but without using Shadow DOM

globalAttributes.name: au-element
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: au-slot for content projection, simular to slot, but without using Shadow DOM

globalAttributes.name: t
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Internationalization: Translation key for i18n

globalAttributes.name: if.bind
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: conditional rendering, add/remove DOM element

globalAttributes.name: else
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: conditional rendering (else condition), add/remove DOM element

globalAttributes.name: switch.bind
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: switch conditional rendering, add/remove DOM element

globalAttributes.name: case
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: switch conditional rendering (case statement), add/remove DOM element

globalAttributes.name: case.bind
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: switch conditional rendering (multi-case statement), add/remove DOM element

globalAttributes.name: default-case
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: switch conditional rendering (default-case statement), add/remove DOM element

globalAttributes.name: repeat.for
globalAttributes.description: Aurelia Template: Repeat over a collection
